body_text: You don't need to catch and then rethrow the error. You can just let it fail, leaving out all the try/catch stuff.
body: You don't need to catch and then rethrow the error. You can just let it fail, leaving out all the try/catch stuff.
body_html: You don't need to catch and then rethrow the error. You can just let it fail, leaving out all the try/catch stuff.
